mainengine

Class HistogramProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainengine.HistogramProcessor

  • public class HistogramProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class HistogramProcessor. It deals with all the processing between MAT objets. These include all the histogram processing and dealing with MAT objects which represent frames or channels of frames. * @see MAT Object - Official Doc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HistogramProcessor()
      Instantiates a new histogram processor.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateHistoOfHueVideo

        public java.util.LinkedList<org.opencv.core.Mat> calculateHistoOfHueVideo(java.util.LinkedList<org.opencv.core.Mat> images)
        Calculates the hue channel's histogram of each frame passed as parameter.
        Parameters:
        images - Collection of hsv frames of the video.
        Returns:
        listOfHueHistograms Collection of the histogram of the hue channel of each frame.
        See Also:
        MAT Object - Official Doc

      • drawHistogram

        public void drawHistogram(org.opencv.core.Mat histogramH,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          int width,
                          int height)
        Creates an image of a histogram represented as a MAT object. It does all the normalization and linearization process for representing the histogram as an image.
        Parameters:
        histogramH - Histogram instance
        name - of the file, including the extension of the file. Let's say: "image.jpg" JPG, JPEG and PNG formats are preferred.
        width - The number of pixels in each row of the image of the histogram. Resolution.
        height - The number of rows of the image of the histogram, represented as rows of pixels. Resolution.
